item.tcc.soldier_basic_tag.desc: A symbol of basic combat skills, providing enhanced base damage
item.tcc.soldier_specific_tag.desc: Specialized training for specific weapon types
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.desc: Converts attack power into more powerful gun damage multiplier
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.effect: Increases 165% rifle, sniper, smg, lmg, launcher damage , increases 55% inaccuracy
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.desc: Perfect combination of rapid movement and precise shooting
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.effect: Provides 150% movement speed bonus while holding guns
item.tcc.ural_wolf_tag.desc: Precise and deadly strikes, showcasing hunter's instinct
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.desc: I will launch an awesome attack
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.effect: When player's health is above 40%, increases 325% general gun damage. After dealing damage, immediately deducts 30% current health, then consumes 5% max health per second for 5 seconds. When player's health is below 40%, all effects are disabled
item.tcc.heaven_fire_apocalypse.effect: When player's health is at 100%, increases 1000% general gun damage, +10 explosion radius, increases 1000% explosion damage. After dealing damage, deducts 100% current health and provides 15 seconds of 100% general gun damage bonus  to players within 32 blocks
item.tcc.magazine_boost.effect: Increases 30% rifle, sniper, smg, lmg, launcher reload speed
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.desc: Higher capacity but slower reloading magazine
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.effect: Increases 66% rifle, sniper, smg, lmg, launcher magazine capacity , decreases 33% reload speed
item.tcc.split_chamber.desc: Technology that splits single bullets into multiple projectiles
item.tcc.split_chamber.effect: Increases 90% rifle, sniper, smg, lmg, launcher bullet count
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.effect: Increases 90% firing speed, reduces 15% general damage and all rifle, sniper, smg, lmg, launcher, pistol, shotgun damage
item.tcc.merged_rifling.effect: Increases 155% specific gun damage  and 25% movement speed while holding guns, cannot be equipped with Rifling at the same time
item.tcc.careful_heart: I'm Careful Heart, Not a Fish
item.tcc.careful_heart.effect: Increases 300% launcher damage, 300% explosion damage, and 300% explosion radius
item.tcc.blaze_storm.desc: Master the power of explosions, turning the battlefield into a hellfire
item.tcc.blaze_storm.effect: Increase 24% explosion range , increase 24% explosion damage , cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm Prime at the same time
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.desc: Ultimate explosion control ability, the flame king on the battlefield
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.effect: Increase 66% explosion range , increase 66% explosion damage , cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm at the same time
item.tcc.ripping_prime.desc: Ultimate firing speed combined with powerful penetration ability
item.tcc.evil_accuracy.desc: Ultimate control, reducing recoil while sacrificing firing speed
item.tcc.limit_speed.desc: Let bullets fly at extreme speed
item.tcc.ferocious_extension.desc: Let bullets fly farther to strike distant enemies
item.tcc.rifling.desc: Rifling technology that enhances specific gun damage
item.tcc.rifling.effect: Increase 165% specific gun damage , cannot be equipped with Merged Rifling at the same time
item.tcc.heavy_firepower.desc: Enhance pistol firepower, but affect accuracy
item.tcc.wasp_stinger.desc: Special ornament that enhances pistol damage
item.tcc.prophecy_pact.desc: Mysterious pact that enhances pistol damage
item.tcc.malignant_spread.desc: Enhance shotgun firepower, but affect accuracy
item.tcc.chamber.effect: When holding a sniper rifle, increases damage by 40% , cannot be equipped with Chamber Prime at the same time
item.tcc.chamber_prime.desc: Ultimate enhancement of sniper rifle damage
item.tcc.chamber_prime.effect: When holding a sniper rifle, increases damage by 100% , cannot be equipped with Chamber at the same time
item.tcc.core_fusion.desc: Core material obtained by smelting ornaments in a furnace
item.tcc.core_fusion.effect: Material used to craft advanced ornaments
item.tcc.rift_silver.effect: Right-click to randomly obtain an ornament
item.tcc.rift_silver.usage: Right-click to randomly obtain an ornament
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.desc: Higher capacity but slower reloading magazine
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.effect: Increases 60% shotgun magazine capacity , decreases 18% reload speed
item.tcc.infernal_chamber.desc: Technology that splits single bullets into multiple projectiles
item.tcc.infected_magazine.desc: Higher capacity but slower reloading magazine
item.tcc.infected_magazine.effect: Increases 60% pistol magazine capacity , decreases 30% reload speed
item.tcc.deadly_surge.desc: High firing rate combined with multiple projectiles for deadly effect
item.tcc.deadly_surge.effect: Increases 60% pistol firing speed , increases 60% bullet count
item.tcc.bullet_spread.desc: Technology that splits single bullets into multiple projectiles
item.tcc.oppression_point.desc: Mysterious ornament that enhances melee attack power
item.tcc.oppression_point_prime.desc: Ultimate mysterious ornament that enhances melee attack power
item.tcc.sword_wind.desc: Mysterious ornament that expands melee attack range
item.tcc.sword_wind_prime.desc: Ultimate mysterious ornament that expands melee attack range
